Header.title: Build. Automate. Scale.
Header.paragraph: Turning bold ideas into scalable tech - in 30 days or less.
Header.paragraph1: We support organizations at every growth phase - from early-stage bootstrapping to building and scaling long-term, enterprise-grade systems and applications.

About.title: Our Mission
About.content: We know that finding dependable, high-quality development talent can be difficult. We founded Two Lights to help founders find top-flight talent at competitive rates. You come with the idea and our team will find a way to make it a reality, without breaking the bank.

About.title: Our Approach
About.content: We provide best-in-class support from start to finish. We work directly with you to help define your development needs, connect you with our pipeline of qualified software development teams, and handle all the logistics.

About.title: Our Talent
About.content: We work with highly qualified, rigorously vetted developers active during U.S. business hours. Our standard teams come staffed with a Project Manager, a QA, and a mix of full-stack senior and junior developers proficient in a variety of programming languages.

Services.name: Custom Software & Business Automation
deliverables: CI/CD, test automation, DevOps as code

Features.title: Scope your Needs
Features.description: You provide us with a description of your project and requirements. Our tech leads will scope these into a cohesive project plan.

Features.title: Sign Some Documents
Features.description: After scoping your needs, we use our pricing tool to give a transparent quote. Upon acceptance, we send over a contract.

Features.title: Staff and Plan
Features.description: We will staff your team using our talent pipeline and begin initial project planning and development.

Features.title: Execute Project
Features.description: Together, we build your product while openly communicating throughout development to ensure quality and milestones.

Features.title: Receive Your Product
Features.description: Upon delivery, we ensure satisfaction and transfer all knowledge to the internal team.
